name: Charlene Hall-Pettway
text:
REFRESHINGLY POSITIVE, WARM & GENUINE WORSHIP EXPERIENCE.  NO PRESSURE AT ALL.
VERY POSITIVE ATMOSPHERE OVER ALL.
VERY WELCOMING & HOSPITABLE.

text: Great church... Must check it out for your self , best church I've attended in some time.. wonderful experience..

text: Friendly congregation and God's word

name: Joyce C. Abrams
text: My first time visiting Apostolic Church of God was powerful! moving! and motivating!! This was a Spiritual Blessing for Me! Thank You Jesus... Thank You for Praying for me...  I will be visitng there again..

name: Dale Williams
text: Its been a while since I visited here but the times I been here I was always blessed.The anointing was truly here. The people are friendly and they make you feel at home.

name: Zadaviss Carter
text: Great church and service

name: Kendra Vanlue
text: Wonderful people, and church.  You need to visit.

name: Kenneth Creed
text: Atmosphere very nice

name: Yolanda Jones
text: Very beautiful and gorgeous church, draped with golden furniture and fixtures. Powerful singing and good preaching went forth

name: smithsarai100
text: I had to learn that some churches are alot like a Job u go for yourself not for gossip and drama I will say I enjoyed most of the services and the pastor and Mr And Mrs Anderson

name: Laesha Lamb
text: Great place to worship and fellowship!

name: Leilani Jordan
text: Love it!

name: Fannie Stockdale
text: Ok

name: nathan littleton
text: If you want to know how to get saved live saved and stay saved this is where you need to be.GOD is always in the building and pastor Phillips is undoubtedly one of the most influential real God fearing preachers of all times.

name: Robert Littleton
text: A great church to go to and be saved and get your  praise on

name: Lashawn Johnson
text: Great place 2 go &worship & feel the power & luv of God

name: BMX _soul00
text: My grandma went Healing Fountain Church she was bless Co Pastor Owens  preach

name: Robert Thompson
text: Where the word of God is taught from the scriptures, and the leadership is of God and not of man. It is very possible to give an understanding without teaching the true word of God, but there is no POWER in that word. Contrary to popular belief, God will not change to adapt to man. He is the same God of yesterday, today, and forever, and for that, I appreciate pastor Porterfield.

name: William C
text: Amazing move of God!!!

name: Sundrial Stewart
text: I just love the people ❤️ there!!!

name: D Silent 1
text: Wonderful people create a great atmosphere for God to move in

name: Sarah Willis
text: This church has the best pastor, First Lady and members. You feel the love of God and his presence as soon as you walk in. They teach directly from the word of God, they preach the truth and stand for holiness and righteousness! If you need a touch from God...this is the place to be!

name: Mary Scott
text: I love this church it is my first church home  and where I was baptized at I love it

name: Sheneka Carter
text: It's a wonderful place to worship and truly is a "friendly church with a family atmosphere".

name: Mark Rowan
text: Felt right at home!

name: Sherwood Baldwin
text: You can feel the presence of the Lord there!

name: Micah S
text: Great family atmosphere!!! One God truth!!

name: Ejim Jonathan
text: It is a wonderful church

name: ms. S
text: Visited this church for a conference and had a blast! Great music, friendly church members, and the church was beautiful! If you're local, please do yourself a favor and visit.

name: hi hi
text: This is an amazing church. It is a one of a kind church. I have been to many churches and none of them gave me the experience I have had at this church. You can just feel God standing in that place.The pastor is very kind and he teaches from scripture. I am just so thankful that God let me come to this church with his people.

name: David Moultry
text: Without fear of contradiction it’s a place you are certain to find God. A place where a moving of the spirit happens regularly. Bishop Sutton is the real deal! Granted there’s no good in any of us (thus said the word of God) however he’s truly a man of God that lives, eats and breathe the gospel of Christ. His vision has become the launching pad to hope, love, peace, the truth, and family life the way God intended it to be. Newlife has been nothing short of a blessing to me. The preaching, teaching and culture exemplifies the meaning “NEW LIFE”. If you’re looking for a church home search no longer, for this is the place! Come consumed with expectations and who knows what might happen. It’s a powerful ministry!

name: Elier Avalos
text: As someone who has been in and out of church, I can’t tell you the times that I have been greeted by love and smiles each time that I come back. It is so hard to find a pastor who actually lives by the biblical ideals as the pastor from New Life. It keeps me coming back for more and furthermore, they are not afraid of preaching truth. Thank God for New Life church as well as the leadership ❤️🙏🏼

name: Chelsea Green
text: I felt very pressured to speak in tongues. Alot of judgemental people. If you dont follow their "rules" they blacklist you. More obsessed with man made religion than God Himself.

name: Tristan Hood
text:
I absolutely love this church! The preaching and teaching is the best I’ve experienced in the 30 years I’ve been attending church. The people are warm, inviting, thoughtful, funny, and full of the Holy Ghost. I’ve never gone and not experienced an excellent move of the Spirit.

I’ve worked with the people of New Life and they are top notch. The Praise and Worship is the best I’ve experienced and it’s largely because they put the emphasis on worship. The pastor consistently prays for the praise team during the worship service, the flow is phenomenal and they have the process down to an art. The exhortation is powerful and, again, the preaching is thought provoking and filling.

I’m proud to have experienced 7 years of my spiritual journey at New Life and count it an honor to call its people my friends.

name: E.T. Hollander
text: A Great church that spreads the true word of God. Super people with a love for God and and his people.

name: Chloeey Jackson
text: Will never go back was there from 5 to 17, they do not care about outsiders and most of them are stuck up if you don’t live like they do,I know because I was one of them. It’s a horrible place if I didn’t leave I would have died I was so depressed and no one would take the time and talk to me.

name: Cynthia Hagadorn
text: I love this place and the people.  New life  has a special place in my heart. I call it home. My friends & family welcome you.

name: Gregory Hall
text: I was not thrilled when visiting this church. Parishioners were very pushy to visitors. Ministers were quite over bearing. Everyone was just too overwhelming and I simply could not just attend church and try and experience, learn something, or enjoy it myself. Someone said to me they were a “multicultural “ church. I’m not sure what was meant by multicultural as it was overwhelming white southern evangelical culture there and not much more. I just simply do not recommend. 👎

name: Bert Pierce
text: This is an incredibly spiritual atmosphere of active praise and worship!  Awesome messages to this multicultural church body are sure to expand your understanding of the Bible and God's will in your life!

name: Roy ORR
text: My boys loved going to preschool there. Many thanks and blessings to the staff and especially Mrs. Kandi. ❤️

name: Sabrina Mckinney
text: The title speaks for itself. New Life. Look no further, This church has EVERYTHING that you need. They teach the 100% TRUTH and nothing but the TRUTH. If you're confused, hungry, thirsty, or lost, this is the missing piece to the puzzle. 1,000 star Rating!

name: Brooke Tisdale
text: The most amazing, revival centered church you could be apart of! The pastor is wonderful, as well as the church family. I'm so glad I've been apart of this church for many years now, and will be apart of it for many more to come! Highly recommend coming to New Life and experiencing the presence of God!

name: Tynese Tippins
text: I love this Church! The man of God here truly lives what he preaches. When you can look around and see the diversity and feel the love; the leadership must be doing something right.

name: maria smith
text: Great Place of worship. Amazing place to grow in Christ. Amazing diverse family of Christ. The fist day you will experience the presence of God.  Kids love it too!!

name: Tina Pierce
text: This is a wonderfuly multicultural church of sincere and loving people!  I thank God for New Life!!!

name: J Simmons
text: Wonderful, diversity community of people, believing in the God head - God, Jesus and the Holy Ghost. Scripture based, worship oriented and a family sense are all a part of this church. As a newcommer we were  affectionately welcomed and included, as if we had been a part of this body for years. Believe and receive here, for a visit or for life.

name: Patience Oneil
text: It is very rare to find a church that teaches the whole truth in Birmingham. The presence of God is overwhelming in every single service. Powerful preaching, annointed music, miracles, signs, wonders, love and family are a few things you will find at New Life.

name: Jim Corey
text: Awesome worship!

name: Dane Stipes
text: Definitely a church that I could never imagine leaving! The people are genuine, the pastor is beyond phenomenal, and God moves in every single service! If you're looking for a real and fervent move of God then this church is definitely a place you would love to call home!

name: TM
text: Absolutely amazing and welcoming church family. The preaching is 100% Biblical and the worship and atmosphere are phenomenal and God centered.

name: Sam Iam
text: A place where Truth, is taught, and you are encouraged to see it for yourself in the word of God. The Pastor tells you what you need to know to be saved, and sometimes it's not what your flesh wants to hear. Everything is they do is backed up by the word of God.

name: Ollie Gunn
text: Great place and wonderful atmosphere!!

name: Amber Corey
text: Absolutely love this church! Life changing services, great pastor, friendly people, awesome worship, God moves in every service. Come and you will be blessed...guaranteed!

name: Kathleen Viar
text: True example of what THE WORD OF God teaches....Great Church, Great People, Great Worship, Great Preaching.....Great Pastor! Best in Birmingham area!

name: Pam Dodd
text: Amazing church and every one treats you like family and we all love each other even if its your first time.

name: Joseph Prath
text: Great people and well kept facility.

name: Nate Carr (n8carr)
text: I have gone to New Life for over 25 years.  No other church like this one in the world.

name: Faith Abraham
text: Where one can find true biblical knowledge and diversity of fellowship, family building leadership, a community where everyone grows up in God together reaching for hold on eternal life and living a more abundant this life.

name: Jillian Raposo
text: Blessed to be a part of such an amazing church! Incredible pastor and a loving, friendly church family. If you're looking for life-changing services, this is the place!

name: Peter Magnolia
text: Greatest pastor and church family! I would be lost without this place.

name: matt wood
text: Awesome place with awesome people! Definitely life-changing.

name: David Carr
text: This place is where the truth is taught,  just try it for your self.

name: James Gladney
text: Totally fresh experience! This is what and what the church is meant to be...

name: Kayla Hurst
text: Amazing life-changing place with great people.

name: Jai T
text: Wonderful people, pastor, and youth team. This church change my life.

name: Rachel Brantley
text: Great place to worship!

name: Dawson Smith
text: A true revival oriented church.

name: Karen Weber
text: Transforming

name: Karen Weber
text: Just amazing...

name: Dustin Corey
text: Blessed to be apart of this family.

name: Chantelle Rogers
text: Awesome church with the power of God always moving during their services. The people are friendly and welcoming, and the ministry staff is top notch. You are welcomed dressed as you are, so don't worry about your clothes.They treat everyone like family and are always glad to see new faces. If you are in the area on a Wednesday or Sunday do yourself a favor and join them for a service. I know they would love to have you there with them.

name: michael holden
text: Very lively down to earth friendly people.

name: Kelli Daniel
text: Welcoming and friendly church who loves people

name: Michelle T
text: Love this place

name: Drew Hood
text: Fantastic Pastor, awesome music and singing, great people, friends and family. And the best part of all, it’s a one God Apostolic Pentecostal church.

name: Renee Dion
text: Just moved here in this area and needed to find a nice welcoming church and I can honestly say, I found this holy church. It was a great service. If you looking to feel welcome no matter what you look like, this is it.. such a blessed church! We will be back for sure!!! This church blessed my soul!!! 💕🙏🏻

resp.text: Renee, thank you for the kind words!  We are so glad you came and look forward to seeing what God is going to continue to do in your life!

name: aurola ferrille
text: Great place to worship

name: Brittany Hathcote
text: What an amazing, sweet Spirit of God that was felt here. The new sanctuary is stunning, but the worship is what makes it! I can't wait for the next Ladie's Prayer Conference.

name: Bre Mer
text:
Very nice wedding venue
Beautiful building and decor
Accomadating
Can be seen from the main road
Large parking lot

name: Joyce Brown
text:
The Sanctuary is a special place to worship.
I've been there several times and was greeted at the door by some very nice people.
The pastor and first lady are so nice and kind!

resp.text: Thank you Joyce!  God bless you and see you soon!

name: Annette Shaw
text: Every one nice and friendly. It was all race there. I just love it.

name: GREGORY LAWRENCE
text: Beautiful facility. Friendly folks. God's presence felt.

name: Peter Corcoran
text: I've gone to The Sanctuary for over 17 years and I love the people and the music.  There's some very special folks at this church!

name: Michael Herring
text: Amazing church full of God's Love

name: Jasmine Corcoran
text: When I first came to The Sanctuary I loved all of the friendly people who were eager to get to know me! I kept coming back because I love the people, the music, and the sprit of God that I feel here! I'm so proud to call The Sanctuary my church home!

name: Richard Smith
text: Powerful moves of the Spirit, anointed preaching from a good pastor, loving, friendly, non-judgmental people, great music with a good mix of gospel, Pentecostal and contemporary Christian songs played.  We started attending about a year ago and these were a few of the reasons we joined.

name: Jacob Boles
text: Good ots good

name: Kim Spencer
text: Awesome church all the time

name: Tom cole
text: Excellent church

name: Danielle Jolley
text: Most accepting people ever meet

name: Angela Smith
text: Best Church ever!!!!!!!!!

resp.text: All of us at The Sanctuary lone you Angela!!

name: Tina Roehm
text: Love my church and my church family. I cant wait to come back to my church family.

name: Linda Martin
text: Wonderful church family... exciting place to be. The people are so loving and friendly. Check this one out if you need a church in Greenville, AL.

name: Jan Moreno
text: Wonderful  worship, PRAISE, alive and anointing preaching.

name: Vincent Sanders
text: Enjoyed the service and members were very nice.

name: The Sullivans
text: Great church to attend and worship God!! The love of God is shown as soon as you enter into the building.

name: Beth Dunn
text: Great friendly people. These people make you feel like part of the family and are always willing to help. Love these people.

name: Noel Littrell
text: Very spirit filled ,preaching Gods word with authority and followers of Christ Jesus,pastor Moore very knowledgeable and I am edified.can feel the love of Christ through the brethren....come as you are

name: Vicki Anderson
text: Awesome Church.  Everyone is very friendly, a wonderful Church!!!!

name: Kimberly McIntyre
text: Love this place and church family

name: Tina Martinez
text: Excellent Church

name: Tracy Tondola
text: great church
